item.title: An infuriating wrinkle in the Brown University shooting
item.description: The Brown University campus has hundreds of cameras, but none caught the shooter’s face.

item.description: The Sunshine State would be foolish to mess up its tax mix.

item.title: My dad is shrinking to nothing. His bogus conviction is alarming.

item.title: America first? Not when Trump is dealing with China.
item.description: The president’s second-term China policy started out aggressive. That quickly changed.

item.title: GLP-1s can’t cure everything after all

item.title: ‘Kind of embarrassed’: In Vance’s hometown, I saw patience running thin
item.description: Middletown’s regard for its most famous son was more subdued than I’d expected.

item.title: Jimmy Lai and the end of Hong Kong
item.description: The fate of the former British colony is a warning to any nation that cuts a deal with China.

item.title: Chicago has lost its mind
item.description: The city’s fiscal situation is dire, and Mayor Brandon Johnson is determined to make things worse.

item.title: Are U.S. tariffs on China working? Look at the evidence.
item.description: Years into a broad trade war, evidence shows export controls would be more effective.

item.title: Seizing Venezuelan oil tankers could backfire on Trump
item.description: More legally defensible than blowing up boats, but that doesn’t make it a good idea or policy.

item.title: I came from Somalia at 19. Let me tell you about the America I met.
item.description: President Trump’s anti-immigrant ranting betrays the Americans who welcome the stranger.

item.title: How to cut the velvet rope to GLP-1s
item.description: To democratize access to these weight-loss drugs, we need flexible, employer-driven solutions.

item.title: I’m tracking Pennsylvania’s wild politics. Here’s what I found in the woods.
item.description: To understand this critical swing state, you must understand bear camp.
